1111 000001 0000000000000100000000    LDPC $r1 0x100
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
0101 000010 000001 0000000000000000   INC $r2 $r1
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
0110 000011 000001 0000000000000000   NEG $r3 $r1
1111 001010 0000000000000000001000    LDPC $r10 0x008
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
1011 001010 0000000000000000000000    BRN $r10
00000000000000000000000000000000	  flush
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
0101 000010 000010 0000000000000000   INC $r2 $r2
0011 000000 000001 000001 0000000000  ST $r1 $r1
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
1110 000100 000001 0000000000000000   LD $r4 $r1
0100 000101 000001 000010 0000000000  ADD $r5 $r1 $r2
00000000000000000000000000000000
0111 000110 000100 000001 0000000000  SUB $r6 $r4 $r1
1111 001011 0000000000000000001001    LDPC $r11 9
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
1001 001011 0000000000000000000000    BRZ $r11
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
0101 000010 000010 0000000000000000   INC $r2, $r2
1010 000001 0000000000000000000000    JM $r1
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
00000000000000000000000000000000
1000 000001 0000000000000000000000    J $r1 (will be at address 0x100)
